Hurriedly, Misao rearranged her clothes, wiped her wet lips and turned away from the man.

name: Misao
normalized: F-Forgive me.

name: You
normalized: …Ha ha.
Looking up at the door Misao had just exited, the man chuckled to himself.

name: You
normalized: ''Forgive me'…ha ha, what a charmingly ancient way of speaking that ninja has…!
Misao, on the other hand, couldn't help but notice that, even after leaving the room, her pulse continued to pound in her ears.
Having been trained to remain calm and composed on any battlefield, how was it that she was so easily shaken?
And besides her pounding pulse, she was surprised by the feeling that seemed to increase with each step she took go further away from his room.
It was almost as if she had left part of her heart in the room with him…
That was Misao's first real taste of emotional confusion in her new world.
